thread.title: Denise Leone
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Denise Leone

author: Denise Leone
title: Denise Leone
text: I have been doing puzzles for 30+ years and I find White Mountain Puzzles to be the BEST I have ever done. The size of the pieces are perfect. The color & clarity of the pieces are top notch. The variety of the pictures are endless and enjoyable. Thank you for bringing so much joy to an activity I love to do.
